name: BTS Piano Tiles - Kpop
description:
Your favorite song is here at your fingertips, simply enjoy the game by taping on black tiles and trying to match the music beat!.

BTS Piano - Kpop is the beast piano tiles ,you can play the most popular song of BTS Groupe .

Enjoy every rhythm and rhythm of music from this piano app with list BTS song on request:
- BTS Fake Love
- BTS DNA
- BTS Mic Drop
- BTS Love Your Self
- BTS Boy in luv
- BTS go go
- BTS Anpanman


Disclaimer.

This game is not an official app. There is no copyrighted material, everything we make is done by us including the piano music!
